DOC.HEADLINE: RECORD RACK : IN BRIEF
DOC.TEXT: Ice_Cube , " Bootlegs & B-Sides , " ( * * ) Street Knowledge / Priority . Did we really need a remix of Ice_Cube ' s weakest single to date , " You Know How We Do It " ? This lackluster , partly superfluous collection includes B-sides , remixes and three new songs , but only one of the new ones , the fiery " You Don ' t Wanna ---- With These , " comes_close to Cube at his best . New albums are rated on a scale of one star ( poor ) , two stars ( fair ) , three stars ( good ) and four stars ( excellent ) . Heidi Siegmund
